keywords.value: Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Metrics and social media may have overtaken music-makers at this festival full of celebrities.

headline.print_headline: Talent vs. Buzz: The Push-Pull of Coachella
headline.main: Talent vs. Buzz: the Push-Pull of Coachella

snippet: Metrics and social media may have overtaken music-makers at this festival full of celebrities.
abstract: Ben Ratliff Critic's Notebook notices that lineup for Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival is dominated by popular, commercial acts and celebrities rather than serious music-makers.
